abstract: Andy Murray defeats Tomas Berdych to advance to Miami Open tennis tournament final.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray lost his first service game in each set but advanced to the Miami Open final in Key Biscayne, Fla., by beating Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-4.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Djokovic-Murray Final Set

snippet: Andy Murray lost his first service game in each set but advanced to the Miami Open final in Key Biscayne, Fla., by beating Tomas Berdych, 6-4, 6-4.
